About.paragraph: We are a group of Individuals who strive to provide the best Education, alongwith a Friendly User-Expereince and Ease of Accessibility.
Why2: Discuss and clarify doubts 24/7 by tutors

Testimonials.text: "I found the website very attractive, I was able to connect with all kinds of students and share my knowledge and experience with them. "
Testimonials.name: Neil Jain - Tutor

Testimonials.text: "The perfomance of my son has increased dramatically after enrolling in the courses provided here."
Testimonials.name: Nitin Ahmed- Parent

Testimonials.text: "I found a lot of great Tutors who cleared doubts, that even my school teachers couldn't."
Testimonials.name: Mukesh kumar- Student

Features.title: Discuss Doubts and chat
Features.text: Now Discuss and Chat with a fully integrated chat app. Create Groups to ask doubts and ask Questions to tutors directly!

Features.title: The Best Courses and Tutors
Features.text: Parents can look for courses by the best tutors, and register their children into the course.

Features.title: Community Driven Portal
Features.text: The best community to help your children Learn and grow.

Features.title: Attend and watch Classes
Features.text: Access all the course material and attend classes to complete the course.
